path /v3/nft/mint

message endpoint spec too long see https//apidoctatumio/tag/NFT ERC721 or compatible/#operation/nftminterc721 for more info

path /v3/nft/verify
opid nftverifyincollection
params None
sum verify an nft in an nft collection on solana
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
chain
type string
desc the blockchain to work with
enum
sol
nftaddress
maxlength 44
minlength 43
desc the blockchain address of the nft to verify
type string
collectionaddress
maxlength 44
minlength 43
desc the blockchain address of the nft collection where the nft should be verified in the collection must be a sized collection that was introduced in version 13 of the metaplex token metadata program
type string
from
maxlength 44
minlength 43
desc the blockchain address of the collection verifier on behalf of whom the transaction will be originated the transaction fee will be paid from this address
type string
fromprivatekey
type string
maxlength 128
minlength 64
desc the private key of the collection verifiers address
feepayer
desc address on the solana blockchain from which the fee will be paid for transaction defaults to from

minlength 43

feepayerprivatekey
type string
maxlength 87
minlength 128
desc private key of the fee payer address
